articles.title: European Commission formally submits a proposal for a unified charging interface - Gizchina.com
articles.description: European Commission formally submits a proposal for a unified charging interface. This is obviously a very bad news for Apple
articles.content: There have been reports and speculations that the European Commission is proposing a unified charger for smartphones in the region. However, it is no longer speculation as the European Commission for… [+2782 chars]
